comments:
1. Create a Java project with attached class
2. Go to Profiling and Logging perspective
3. Click Profile... from the menu bar to open the Profile dialog
4. Select Java Application and click the New button to create a launch 
configuration
5. Click Arguments tab, set VM arguments to '-
Djava.library.path=D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.swt.win32_3.0.1
\os\win32\x86', and click Profile
6. Go to Profiling Monitor view, select the agent and select 'Detach from 
Agent' from the context menu
7. Click Profile... again to open the profile dialog
8. Select Attach - Java Process, click New button  to create a launch 
configuration
9. Select the agent and click Profile
10. Go to Profiling Monitor view, terminate the active agent, and shut down the 
workbench
11. Launch the workbench again, repeat step 3
12. Select the configuration under Java Application and click Profile
13. The status bar shows a message 'fetch children of host', after that, 
the 'Error Running Operations' window pops up, saying 'CTree.updateTrees(Error: 
Error)
